pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reduced-Rank Regression // Multivariate regression methodologies including reduced-rank regression (RRR), reduced-rank ridge regression (RRS), robust reduced-rank regression (R4), generalized/mixed-response reduced-rank regression (mRRR), row- sparse reduced-rank regression (SRRR), reduced-rank regression with a sparse singular value decomposition (RSSVD), and sparse and orthogonal factor regression (SOFAR).
